page.title: 01 LILLINGTON
page.content: {Lillington}has a lot of features like the housing estates. There are lots of them and there are flats in Eden Court. They are called Eden Court after Sir Anthony Eden who was once Prime Minister of England and our local MP. There is also the old part of Lillington and three churches, the free church, Mary Magdelen, and a Catholic church by the library. There is also a shopping area which provide things for everyday needs. There are also the First and Middle Schools. There are some big events which are held at the Campion Hills. Some BMX teams from Coventry & Birmingham come to the Campion Hills to take part in the BMX racing. Aswell as the BMX racing there are two more events which come once a year. They are the fair and the circus. They attract people from Warwick & Leamington.
